intro: Banisteriopsis stellaris, commonly known as the starry banisteriopsis, is a climbing plant native to the tropical rainforests of South America. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes many flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its star-shaped leaves and small, clustered white flowers that bloom throughout the growing season. Its fruit is a small, fleshy berry that contains several seeds. Banisteriopsis stellaris is often found in the undergrowth, where it uses its tendrils to climb towards sunlight.
